requestBody.title: Owner reviews consolidated calendar state API Trace

resultPayload.note: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.

resultPayload.note: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "No charge during hold". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Liability/attendee change". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.
